name: 8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle - Snapshot Mind
detailed_description:
Snapshot Mind

Twenty minutes of classes a day, in a month give an amazing result. And you will understand this as soon as you begin the training.
This fascinating test will interest anyone, regardless of age, gender and beliefs. There are many memory trainings, but this one is very exciting, effective and easy to use. It is accessible to everyone: both to the child, and to the adult.
